# Holocron

> PyTorch implementations of recent Computer Vision tricks (ReXNet, RepVGG, Unet3p, YOLOv4, CIoU loss, AdaBelief, PolyLoss, MobileOne).

## Getting started

- [Installation](https://frgfm.github.io/holocron/getting-started/installation/index.md)
- [Holocron Notebooks](https://frgfm.github.io/holocron/getting-started/notebooks/index.md)

## Package Reference

- [holocron.models](https://frgfm.github.io/holocron/reference/models/models/index.md)
- [Layers](https://frgfm.github.io/holocron/reference/nn/index.md)
- [Operators](https://frgfm.github.io/holocron/reference/ops/index.md)
- [Optimizers](https://frgfm.github.io/holocron/reference/optim/index.md)
- [Trainer](https://frgfm.github.io/holocron/reference/trainer/index.md)
- [Transforms](https://frgfm.github.io/holocron/reference/transforms/index.md)
- [holocron.utils](https://frgfm.github.io/holocron/reference/utils/index.md)
- [Data](https://frgfm.github.io/holocron/reference/utils.data/index.md)

## Notes

- [Changelog](https://frgfm.github.io/holocron/notes/changelog/index.md)
